.content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area{padding-right:2.5rem;width:calc(100% - 300px)}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:100%}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:18.75rem}}.site-content__layout--full-width .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:0;padding-right:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:1rem}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:2rem;padding-right:1rem}.site-content__layout--app *{margin-bottom:0;margin-top:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:0}}.site-content__layout--app .site-main{background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,right top,from(#bdcadb),color-stop(20%,#d8e4f2),color-stop(47%,#deeaf8),color-stop(72%,#d8e4f3),to(#c1cedf));background:-o-linear-gradient(left,#bdcadb 0,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf 100%);background:linear-gradient(90deg,#bdcadb,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf)}.site-content--has-story-package-hero{max-width:100%;overflow-x:hidden}.widget-area{position:relative;z-index:1}.widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}.widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.widget-area .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase;text-align:center;width:100%}@media (min-width:64rem){.widget-area .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase}}.image-wrapper.landscape:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.landscape:not(.square-on-mobile) img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative;background-color:#ebebeb}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile) img{height:100%;left:0;left:50%;margin-right:-50%;position:absolute;top:0;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%);-ms-transform:translate(-50%);transform:translate(-50%);width:auto}.image-wrapper.portrait-headshot{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:133.33333%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.portrait-headshot img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.square{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:100%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.square img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}@media (max-width:31.9375rem){.image-wrapper.square-on-mobile.portrait{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:100%;position:relative}}@media (max-width:31.9375rem){.image-wrapper.square-on-mobile.portrait                <h4 class="article-list__article-title">

                </a>

                 Video
                </span>

             </article>
             <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox2now.com/news/missouri/sundays-beautiful-weather-coaxes-st-louisans-to-venture-outdoors-for-fun-and-sunshine/">
                 Sunday’s beautiful weather coaxes St. Louisans to venture outdoors for fun and sunshine
                </a>
               </h4>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                 <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                  <defs>
                   <style>
                    .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}
                   </style>
                  </defs>
                  <path class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" data-name="video small carousel button default" id="video_small_carousel_button_default" transform="translate(-831 -1161)">

                 </svg>
                </span>

                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
             </article>

        <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1686646" data-collection="article-list1" data-index="4">
         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link" data-link-label="St. Louis County Police issue endangered person advisory for 22-year-old man with autism" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="4" data-link-type="standard-content-link" href="https://fox2now.com/news/st-louis-county-police-issue-endangered-person-advisory-for-22-year-old-autistic-man/">
            St. Louis County Police issue endangered person advisory for 22-year-old man with autism
           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-4" data-link-label="News" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="4" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://fox2now.com/news/">
            News
           </a>
           /
           <time datetime="2021-03-20T21:43:15-05:00">
            23 hours ago
           </time>
          </footer>
         </div>

             <path d="M17.944 5.55a.733.733 0 0 1-.032.34v.03c0 .01-.006.01-.008.01a.189.189 0 0 1-.028.05.619.619 0 0 1-.123.17c-.009.01-.013.02-.023.03l-4.927 4.56a.733.733 0 0 1-.5.19.753.753 0 0 1-.54-.23.737.737 0 0 1 .041-1.04l3.547-3.28H.738a.735.735 0 1 1 0-1.47h14.693l-3.74-3.68a.735.735 0 0 1 1.03-1.05l5.022 4.94s0 .01.008.01a.016.016 0 0 0 .017.01.8.8 0 0 1 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z">
             </path>
            </svg>
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
        </section>

            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1686898" data-collection="article-list4" data-index="1">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list4" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox2now.com/news/missouri/golden-eggs-to-be-hidden-at-public-transit-centers-in-st-louis-illinois/">
                Golden eggs to be hidden at public transit centers in St. Louis, Illinois
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox2now.com/news/missouri/">
                Missouri
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-21T19:29:50-05:00">
                2 hours ago

          <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col">
           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            Sports
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1686899" data-collection="article-list6" data-index="0">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list6" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox2now.com/sports/st-louis-cardinals/cardinals-add-support-to-stopasianhate-movement/">
                Cardinals add support to #StopAsianHate movement
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox2now.com/sports/st-louis-cardinals/">
                St. Louis Cardinals
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-21T19:43:15-05:00">
                1 hour ago
               </time>
              </footer>
             </div>
             <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox2now.com/sports/st-louis-cardinals/cardinals-add-support-to-stopasianhate-movement/">
               <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                <div class="image-wrapper landscape">
                 <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px" src="https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/08/AP20221044623388.jpg?w=1024&amp;h=683&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/08/AP20221044623388.jpg?w=160&amp;h=90&amp;crop=1 160w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/08/AP20221044623388.jpg?w=256&amp;h=144&amp;crop=1 256w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/08/AP20221044623388.jpg?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/08/AP20221044623388.jpg?w=512&amp;h=288&amp;crop=1 512w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/08/AP20221044623388.jpg?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1 640w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/08/AP20221044623388.jpg?w=876&amp;h=493&amp;crop=1 876w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/08/AP20221044623388.jpg?w=960&amp;h=540&amp;crop=1 960w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/08/AP20221044623388.jpg?w=1024&amp;h=683&amp;crop=1 1280w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/08/AP20221044623388.jpg?w=1024&amp;h=683&amp;crop=1 1752w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/08/AP20221044623388.jpg?w=1024&amp;h=683&amp;crop=1 1920w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/08/AP20221044623388.jpg?w=1024&amp;h=683&amp;crop=1 2560w"/>

              </a>

            </article>
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1686856" data-collection="article-list6" data-index="1">

          <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col">
           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            Politics
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1686810" data-collection="article-list8" data-index="0">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list8" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox2now.com/news/politics/biden-aims-to-prevent-border-crossings-from-swamping-agenda/">
                Biden aims to prevent border crossings from swamping agenda
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox2now.com/news/politics/">
                Politics
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-21T12:57:24-05:00">
                8 hours ago
               </time>
              </footer>
             </div>
             <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox2now.com/news/politics/biden-aims-to-prevent-border-crossings-from-swamping-agenda/">
               <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                <div class="image-wrapper landscape">
                 <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px" src="https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2021/03/AP21080010972953-1.jpg?w=2560&amp;h=1440&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2021/03/AP21080010972953-1.jpg?w=160&amp;h=90&amp;crop=1 160w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2021/03/AP21080010972953-1.jpg?w=256&amp;h=144&amp;crop=1 256w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2021/03/AP21080010972953-1.jpg?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2021/03/AP21080010972953-1.jpg?w=512&amp;h=288&amp;crop=1 512w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2021/03/AP21080010972953-1.jpg?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1 640w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2021/03/AP21080010972953-1.jpg?w=876&amp;h=493&amp;crop=1 876w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2021/03/AP21080010972953-1.jpg?w=960&amp;h=540&amp;crop=1 960w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2021/03/AP21080010972953-1.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1 1280w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2021/03/AP21080010972953-1.jpg?w=1752&amp;h=986&amp;crop=1 1752w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2021/03/AP21080010972953-1.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1 1920w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2021/03/AP21080010972953-1.jpg?w=2560&amp;h=1440&amp;crop=1 2560w"/>

            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1686540" data-collection="article-list8" data-index="1">

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list10" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>

              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox2now.com/news/missouri/">
               Missouri
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2020-12-02T15:09:57-06:00">
               4 months ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>
            <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox2now.com/news/missouri/missouri-tracks-covid-data-by-school-district/">
              <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
               <div class="image-wrapper landscape">
                <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="256px" src="https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/10/Screen-Shot-2020-11-05-at-12.19.41-PM.jpg?w=569&amp;h=346&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/10/Screen-Shot-2020-11-05-at-12.19.41-PM.jpg?w=160&amp;h=90&amp;crop=1 160w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/10/Screen-Shot-2020-11-05-at-12.19.41-PM.jpg?w=256&amp;h=144&amp;crop=1 256w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/10/Screen-Shot-2020-11-05-at-12.19.41-PM.jpg?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/10/Screen-Shot-2020-11-05-at-12.19.41-PM.jpg?w=512&amp;h=288&amp;crop=1 512w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/10/Screen-Shot-2020-11-05-at-12.19.41-PM.jpg?w=569&amp;h=346&amp;crop=1 640w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/10/Screen-Shot-2020-11-05-at-12.19.41-PM.jpg?w=569&amp;h=346&amp;crop=1 876w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/10/Screen-Shot-2020-11-05-at-12.19.41-PM.jpg?w=569&amp;h=346&amp;crop=1 960w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/10/Screen-Shot-2020-11-05-at-12.19.41-PM.jpg?w=569&amp;h=346&amp;crop=1 1280w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/10/Screen-Shot-2020-11-05-at-12.19.41-PM.jpg?w=569&amp;h=346&amp;crop=1 1752w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/10/Screen-Shot-2020-11-05-at-12.19.41-PM.jpg?w=569&amp;h=346&amp;crop=1 1920w, https://fox2now.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/14/2020/10/Screen-Shot-2020-11-05-at-12.19.41-PM.jpg?w=569&amp;h=346&amp;crop=1 2560w"/>
               </div>
              </div>
             </a>
            </figure>
           </article>
           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1642399" data-collection="article-list10" data-index="2">
            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list10" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox2now.com/am-show/send-skyfox-helicopter-your-neighborhood-with-this-form/">
               Send SkyFOX helicopter to your neighborhood with this form
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox2now.com/am-show/">
               AM Show
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2021-02-05T11:18:16-06:00">
               1 month ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>
            <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox2now.com/am-show/send-skyfox-helicopter-your-neighborhood-with-this-form/">
              <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
               <div class="image-wrapper landscape">
